title: Not engaged in any discussions: Paytm issues clarification on report claiming Adani in talks to acquire stake in company
description: One97 Communications responds to speculation of Adani Group chairman Gautam Adani considering acquiring a stake in Paytm's parent company. The company clarifies that no discussions are ongoing, emphasizing compliance with SEBI regulations.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
